name: Unbreakable Sally
description:
MADE FOR LUDUM DARE COMPO 37

Sally is in a room.Kidnapped for her powers.
There are men behind the mirrors. Sally doesn't want to demonstrate her powers for them. They bring her little brother Tom in her room to force her.

Now Sally need to shield Tom to keep him alive.

---

Ludum Dare 37 theme was “One Room”. Made it in 48h with the Ludum Dare Compo rules (one man do everything, all assets created within the gamejam). Doing music for the first time of my life. I’m pretty proud of this 30 seconds loop. Game is hard but beatable. See video for the Let’s Play.

---

CONTROLS
For the best experience, use a gamepad with an analog joystick.

LeftAnalog or D-Pad
LOCK TOM
